GSD.product_version: versions from v4.18 to before v5.15.51
GSD.description:
erspan: do not assume transport header is always set

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.51 by commit a3b2470399f679587c45abe56e551caf10becca2, it was introduced in version v4.18 by commit d5db21a3e6977dcb42cee3d16cd69901fa66510a. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: erspan: do not assume transport header is always set
